metadata.title: CVE-2016-6626 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in phpMyAdmin. An attacker could redirect a user toa malicious web page. All 4.6.x versions (prior to 4.6.4), 4.4.x versions(prior to 4.4.15.8), and 4.0.x versions (prior to 4.0.10.17) are affected.

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin package in trusty is affected and needs fixing.
